Package ch.mazluc.game

Class Constant

java.lang.Object
ch.mazluc.game.Constant
public final class Constant extends Object

Constants used in the game.

Modify these constants to change the game's base settings.

⚠️ These constants are not meant to be changed, as they are defined for a stable game experience. Modify at your own risk.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Luca Mazza
